nodes.id: 百万人民反贪倒扁运动

zh-cn: 百万人民反贪倒扁运动

description.zh-cn: 2006年由施明德发起的台湾政治运动，要求时任总统陈水扁因弊案下台。
description.en: A political movement in Taiwan initiated by Shih Ming-teh in 2006, demanding the resignation of then-President Chen Shui-bian over corruption scandals.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，民主进步党前主席，百万人民反贪倒扁运动的发起者与总指挥。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician, former chairman of the Democratic Progressive Party, and the initiator and general commander of the Million People Against Corruption, President Chen Must Go movement.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国第10、11任总统，因其本人及亲信、家人涉及多起贪污弊案而成为百万人民反贪倒扁运动的主要目标。
description.en: The 10th and 11th President of the Republic of China, who became the main target of the Million People Against Corruption, President Chen Must Go movement due to his and his associates' and family's involvement in multiple corruption scandals.

description.zh-cn: 涉及台湾总统陈水扁在任期间使用国务机要费的贪腐案件，是引发百万人民反贪倒扁运动的主要导火索之一。
description.en: A corruption case involving Taiwanese President Chen Shui-bian's use of state affairs funds during his term, which was one of the main triggers for the Million People Against Corruption, President Chen Must Go movement.

description.zh-cn: 2005年爆发的贪污弊案，涉及总统陈水扁周边人士，是反贪倒扁运动的背景之一。
description.en: A corruption scandal that broke out in 2005 involving individuals close to President Chen Shui-bian, forming part of the background to the anti-corruption movement against Chen.

description.zh-cn: 陈水扁的女婿，因涉及内线交易案而引发公众对第一家庭的批评。
description.en: Son-in-law of Chen Shui-bian, whose involvement in an insider trading case sparked public criticism of the First Family.

description.zh-cn: 指涉及陈水扁女婿赵建铭的内线交易案件，是引发反贪倒扁运动的弊案之一。
description.en: Refers to the insider trading case involving Chen Shui-bian's son-in-law, Chao Chien-ming, which was one of the scandals that triggered the anti-corruption movement.

description.zh-cn: 陈水扁的妻子，被控收受太平洋Sogo百货的礼券等弊案。
description.en: Wife of Chen Shui-bian, accused in scandals such as receiving gift vouchers from Pacific Sogo Department Store.

zh-cn: 对陈水扁总统提出罢免案

description.zh-cn: 由国民党与亲民党籍立委提出的针对总统陈水扁的罢免案，该案最终未获通过。
description.en: A recall motion against President Chen Shui-bian proposed by KMT and PFP legislators, which ultimately failed to pass.

description.zh-cn: 时任国民党籍立法委员，是2006年中华民国总统罢免案的提案人之一。
description.en: A KMT legislator at the time, and one of the proposers of the 2006 presidential recall motion.

description.zh-cn: 时任亲民党籍立法委员，是2006年中华民国总统罢免案的提案人之一。
description.en: A PFP legislator at the time, and one of the proposers of the 2006 presidential recall motion.

description.zh-cn: 台湾主要政党之一，在百万人民反贪倒扁运动中持支持立场。
description.en: One of the major political parties in Taiwan, which supported the Million People Against Corruption, President Chen Must Go movement.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政党之一，在百万人民反贪倒扁运动中持支持立场。
description.en: A political party in Taiwan that supported the Million People Against Corruption, President Chen Must Go movement.

description.zh-cn: 台湾主要政党之一，时为执政党，是百万人民反贪倒扁运动的主要反对对象。
description.en: One of the major political parties in Taiwan and the ruling party at the time, which was the main target of the Million People Against Corruption, President Chen Must Go movement.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政党之一，在2006年总统罢免案中采取投废票策略，从而阻挡了罢免案的通过。
description.en: A political party in Taiwan that blocked the passage of the 2006 presidential recall motion by casting invalid ballots.

nodes.id: 百万人民倒扁运动总部

zh-cn: 百万人民倒扁运动总部

description.zh-cn: 由施明德宣布成立，负责策划与执行百万人民反贪倒扁运动的组织机构。
description.en: Announced by Shih Ming-teh, this organization was responsible for planning and executing the Million People Against Corruption, President Chen Must Go movement.

description.zh-cn: 时任民进党籍立法委员，曾爆料质疑施明德发动倒扁的正当性。
description.en: A DPP legislator at the time who made allegations questioning the legitimacy of Shih Ming-teh's anti-Chen campaign.

description.zh-cn: 时任民进党籍立法委员，曾爆料质疑施明德发动倒扁的正当性。
description.en: A DPP legislator at the time who made allegations questioning the legitimacy of Shih Ming-teh's anti-Chen campaign.

description.zh-cn: 时任台北市市长与国民党主席，对倒扁运动表达支持。
description.en: Then-Mayor of Taipei and Chairman of the KMT, who expressed support for the anti-Chen movement.

description.zh-cn: 时任国民党台北市长参选人，对倒扁运动表达支持。
description.en: The KMT's candidate for Taipei Mayor at the time, who expressed support for the anti-Chen movement.

en: Government of the Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 在百万人民反贪倒扁运动期间，由陈水扁领导的执政当局，是运动的主要抗议对象。
description.en: The ruling authority led by Chen Shui-bian during the anti-corruption movement, which was the main target of the protests.

description.zh-cn: 台湾本土社团，曾主办支持陈水扁的集会活动。
description.en: A Taiwanese local association that organized rallies in support of Chen Shui-bian.

description.zh-cn: 由倒扁总部在2006年双十节发动的未经申请的游行示威活动。
description.en: An unpermitted protest march initiated by the anti-Chen headquarters on National Day in 2006.

nodes.id: 台北市长马英九特别费案

zh-cn: 台北市长马英九特别费案

description.zh-cn: 一宗针对时任台北市长马英九的特别费使用的案件，被认为是绿营方面对倒扁运动的反制。
description.en: A case concerning the use of special allowance funds by then-Taipei Mayor Ma Ying-jeou, considered a countermeasure by the pan-green camp against the anti-Chen movement.

description.zh-cn: 查黑行动中心检察官，曾传讯马英九调查其特别费案。
description.en: A prosecutor from the special investigation unit who summoned Ma Ying-jeou for questioning regarding his special allowance case.

description.zh-cn: 由反贪腐倒扁总部的部分核心干部于2007年底组成的政党。
description.en: A political party formed in late 2007 by some core members of the anti-corruption headquarters.

description.zh-cn: 负责侦办“天下围攻”违法集会游行案件的司法机关。
description.en: The judicial body responsible for investigating the illegal assembly and parade case of the 'Besiege from All Sides' event.

description.zh-cn: 时任美国在台协会台北办事处处长，曾对倒扁运动的部分行为提出批评。
description.en: Then-Director of the American Institute in Taiwan, Taipei Office, who criticized certain actions of the anti-Chen movement.

description.zh-cn: 时任中华民国行政院长，对倒扁运动持批评态度。
description.en: Then-Premier of the Republic of China, who held a critical stance towards the anti-Chen movement.

relationships.target: 百万人民倒扁运动总部

description.zh-cn: 施明德于2006年8月12日宣布成立“百万人民倒扁运动总部”。
description.en: Shih Ming-teh announced the establishment of the 'Headquarters for the Million People to Oust Chen' on August 12, 2006.

relationships.source: 百万人民倒扁运动总部
relationships.target: 百万人民反贪倒扁运动

description.zh-cn: 百万人民倒扁运动总部负责策划和执行了整个百万人民反贪倒扁运动。
description.en: The headquarters planned and executed the entire Million People Against Corruption, President Chen Must Go movement.

relationships.target: 百万人民倒扁运动总部

description.zh-cn: 施明德是百万人民反贪倒扁运动的发起者与总指挥。
description.en: Shih Ming-teh was the initiator and general commander of the Million People Against Corruption, President Chen Must Go movement.

relationships.target: 百万人民反贪倒扁运动

description.zh-cn: 总统陈水扁涉及的国务机要费案是引发百万人民反贪倒扁运动的主要原因。
description.en: The state affairs fund case involving President Chen Shui-bian was the main reason for triggering the Million People Against Corruption, President Chen Must Go movement.

relationships.target: 百万人民反贪倒扁运动

description.zh-cn: 2005年爆发的高雄捷运外劳弊案是导致反贪倒扁运动发生的背景事件之一。
description.en: The Kaohsiung MRT foreign labor scandal that broke out in 2005 was one of the background events that led to the anti-corruption movement.

relationships.target: 百万人民反贪倒扁运动

description.zh-cn: 陈水扁女婿赵建铭涉及的内线交易案是引发反贪倒扁运动的弊案之一。
description.en: The insider trading case involving Chen Shui-bian's son-in-law, Chao Chien-ming, was one of the scandals that triggered the anti-corruption movement.

relationships.target: 百万人民反贪倒扁运动

description.zh-cn: 总统罢免案在立法院未能通过，促使施明德发起体制外的街头运动。
description.en: The failure of the presidential recall motion in the Legislative Yuan prompted Shih Ming-teh to launch an extra-institutional street movement.

relationships.source: 百万人民反贪倒扁运动

description.zh-cn: 该运动的主要诉求是要求时任总统陈水扁为其及家人亲信涉及的诸多弊案负责并主动下台。
description.en: The main demand of the movement was for then-President Chen Shui-bian to take responsibility for numerous corruption scandals involving himself, his family, and his confidants, and to step down voluntarily.

description.zh-cn: 吴淑珍是陈水扁的妻子。
description.en: Wu Shu-chen is the wife of Chen Shui-bian.

description.zh-cn: 赵建铭是陈水扁的女婿。
description.en: Chao Chien-ming is Chen Shui-bian's son-in-law.

description.zh-cn: 丁守中是2006年总统罢免案的提案人之一。
description.en: Ting Shou-chung was one of the proposers of the 2006 presidential recall motion.

description.zh-cn: 吕学樟是2006年总统罢免案的提案人之一。
description.en: Lu Hsueh-chang was one of the proposers of the 2006 presidential recall motion.

description.zh-cn: 民进党党团限制党籍立委不进场投票，导致罢免案因未达门槛而失败。
description.en: The DPP caucus restricted its legislators from entering the chamber to vote, causing the recall motion to fail due to not meeting the threshold.

description.zh-cn: 台联动员集体投废票，导致罢免案因未达门槛而失败。
description.en: The TSU mobilized its members to cast invalid ballots, causing the recall motion to fail due to not meeting the threshold.

description.zh-cn: 王世坚爆料质疑施明德发动倒扁的正当性。
description.en: Wang Shih-chien made allegations questioning the legitimacy of Shih Ming-teh's anti-Chen campaign.

description.zh-cn: 林国庆爆料质疑施明德发动倒扁的正当性。
description.en: Lin Kuo-ching made allegations questioning the legitimacy of Shih Ming-teh's anti-Chen campaign.

description.zh-cn: 施明德因王世坚的爆料而对其提起毁谤告诉。
description.en: Shih Ming-teh filed a defamation lawsuit against Wang Shih-chien over his allegations.

relationships.target: 百万人民反贪倒扁运动

description.zh-cn: 时任台北市长的马英九数度前往静坐现场赠送早餐以表达支持。
description.en: Then-Taipei Mayor Ma Ying-jeou visited the protest site several times to deliver breakfast and express his support.

relationships.target: 百万人民反贪倒扁运动

description.zh-cn: 时任国民党台北市长参选人郝龙斌数度前往静坐现场表达支持。
description.en: Then-KMT Taipei mayoral candidate Hau Lung-pin visited the protest site several times to express his support.

relationships.source: 百万人民倒扁运动总部

description.zh-cn: 百万人民反贪倒扁运动的主要抗议对象是陈水扁领导的中华民国政府。
description.en: The main target of the Million People Against Corruption movement was the Republic of China government led by Chen Shui-bian.

relationships.target: 百万人民倒扁运动总部

description.zh-cn: 国民党是支持反贪倒扁运动的主要政治力量之一。
description.en: The Kuomintang was one of the main political forces supporting the anti-corruption movement.

relationships.target: 百万人民倒扁运动总部

description.zh-cn: 亲民党是支持反贪倒扁运动的主要政治力量之一。
description.en: The People First Party was one of the main political forces supporting the anti-corruption movement.

description.zh-cn: 台湾社于2006年9月16日主办了“我们在向阳的地方”挺扁大会。
description.en: Taiwan Society organized the 'We are on the Sunny Side' rally to support Chen Shui-bian on September 16, 2006.

relationships.source: 百万人民倒扁运动总部

description.zh-cn: 倒扁总部于2006年双十节发动了“天下围攻”活动。
description.en: The anti-Chen headquarters launched the 'Besiege from All Sides' event on National Day in 2006.

relationships.target: 台北市长马英九特别费案

description.zh-cn: 民进党立委指出马英九的市长特别费问题，被视为对倒扁运动的反制。
description.en: DPP legislators pointed out issues with Ma Ying-jeou's mayoral special allowance, which was seen as a countermeasure to the anti-Chen movement.

description.zh-cn: 检察官侯宽仁就特别费案传讯了马英九。
description.en: Prosecutor Hou Kuan-jen summoned Ma Ying-jeou for questioning in the special allowance case.

relationships.source: 百万人民倒扁运动总部

description.zh-cn: 反贪腐总部的部分核心干部于2007年底组成红党。
description.en: Some core members of the anti-corruption headquarters formed the Red Party at the end of 2007.

description.zh-cn: 台北地检署因“天下围攻”事件将施明德等16人依违反集会游行法提起公诉。
description.en: The Taipei District Prosecutors Office indicted Shih Ming-teh and 15 others for violating the Assembly and Parade Act in relation to the 'Besiege from All Sides' event.

relationships.target: 百万人民反贪倒扁运动

description.zh-cn: 时任美国在台协会处长杨苏棣对倒扁运动部分行为提出批判。
description.en: Then-Director of the American Institute in Taiwan, Stephen M. Young, criticized certain actions of the anti-Chen movement.

description.zh-cn: 苏贞昌在陈水扁担任总统期间任行政院长。
description.en: Su Tseng-chang served as the Premier during Chen Shui-bian's presidency.
